220  int write_start_tag(const char * name, const char * attrs = 0);

224  int write_element(const char * name, const char * data, const char * attrs = 0);
225 
226  /*
227  * Empty tag (no content) = < Name (optional attributes--zero or more) />
228  * start tag = < Name (optional attributes--zero or more) >
229  * content = element, reference, CDSect, PI, Comment
230  * end tag = </ Name S >
231  *
232  * An element is either an <empty tag /> or a <start tag>content</end tag>
233  * A reference is Entity ref or char ref
234  * Entity ref =&Name;
235  * PEReference = %Name;
236  *
237  * CDSect = '<![CDATA[' (Char* - (Char* ']]>' Char*)) CDEnd ']]>'
238  *
239  * PI (processing instruction) = '<?' PITarget (S (Char* - (Char* '?>' Char*)))? '?>'
240  * Comment = '<!--' ((Char - '-') | ('-' (Char - '-')))* '-->'
241  *
242  *
243  */
244 
245  typedef struct {
246  ssize_t offset;
247  ssize_t size;
248  ssize_t start_tag_size;
249  ssize_t end_tag_size;
250  ssize_t cursor;
251  } context_t;
252 
253  inline const context_t & context() const { return content; }
254  inline void setcontext(const context_t & context) { content = context; }
255 
256
